Translations.Text: Ja human est est anxious
Se tusx adversity despondent
Se ben wealth stingy
Escept por worshipers
Who cxiam observ their kontakt prayers (Salat)
Part their mon est set aside
Por poor needy
Ili kred en Tag Judgment
Ili reverence their Lord's requital
Their Lord's requital ne pren por granted
Ili keep their chastity
(Ili hav relations) nur their spouses ki est legally theirs
anyone transgresses these lim est sinner
believers keep their vort; ili est trustworthy
Their testimony est truthful
Ili consistently observ their kontakt prayers (Salat) sur temp
Ili ind pozici honor Paradise
Ki keeping those est disbelieved joining vi
Al des tuj al las ili flee
Kiel can any da them expect enter blissful Paradise
Neniam; ni kre them ili kon el ki
Mi solemnly jxur Lord de orient okcident; ni est able
Al substitute put popol your met; ni neniam defeated
Do let them blunder lud ili meet tag awaiting them
Ke est tag ili ven graves en a hurry as se herded (sacrificial) altar
Kun their okul subdued fi kovr them. Ke est tag awaiting them
Ni send Noah his popol Vi avert your popol painful retribution aflikt them
Li dir O my popol mi est manifest warner al vi
Al vigl vi ke vi worship DI reverence Him obe me
Li tiam forgive vi your pek respite vi por predetermined period! plej assuredly di appointment neniam delayed once gxi est due vi nur kon
Li dir My Lord mi invit my popol nokt tag
my invitation nur increased their aversion
Whenever mi invit them forgiven Vi ili ej their fingr their orel kovr themselves kun their vest insist torn arrogant
Tiam mi invit them publicly
Tiam mi proklam them loudly mi parol al them privately
Mi dir Implore your Lord forgiveness; Li Forgiving
â€˜Li tiam dusx vi generously pluv
Proviz vi mon infan orchards streams
Why vi ne strive should reverence DI
Li est Unu kre vi en stages
Vi ne realize ti DI kre 7 univers en Do tavol
Li desegn lun therein est light ej sun est lamp
Di germinated vi ter plant
Tiam Li returns vi gxi Li surely bring vi out
DI far TER habitable VI
Ke vi cxarpent roads therein
Noah dir My Lord ili disobeyed me sekv those est eben corrupted when ben mon infan
Ili schemed terrible schemes
Ili dir ne abandon your di! Ne abandon Wadd Suwaa Yaghouth Ya ooq Nasr
Ili misled many Do let wicked plongx profund into loss
Because da their pek ili dron asign hellfire. Ili ne trov helpers protekt them DI
Noah ankaux dir My Lord ne las single disbeliever ter
Se vi let them ili nur mislead your servants don nask al nothing wicked disbelievers
My Lord forgive me my parents anyone enters my hejm as believer all kred hom women Ne don disbelievers anything annihilation
